item.title: Example Result - U14 Mixed Victory
item.description:
Match Report

This is an example result demonstrating the content reference picker feature. The event is selected from the events collection using a searchable dropdown in the CMS.

Key Moments

  • First Quarter: Strong start with excellent ball movement
  • Second Quarter: City Rivals fought back, closing the gap
  • Third Quarter: Even match with both teams trading baskets
  • Fourth Quarter: Defensive excellence secured the win

Player Performance

Exceptional teamwork throughout the match. Every player contributed to this important victory.
